reviews.text: A beautiful and intimate Pakistani restaurant in the heart of Reykjavik. Delicious food, excellent service and great to be able to find authentic halal food from Pakistan in the city. Lots of options on the menu including sharing platters, specials. Prices are reflective of Reykjavik and Iceland generally so expect to pay more but it's worth it. The staff were brilliant, sharing info on the community in the city and exchanging stories from Pakistan. Worth a visit for anyone looking for traditional Pakistani or halal food. Longest established Pakistani restaurant in city.

I was both surprised and delighted to discover Shalimar Cuisine in downtown Reykjavik, a truly authentic Pakistani food in the heart of Iceland. I was greeted with warm smiles and excellent customer service that made me feel instantly at home.

The food at Shalimar is a testament to the chef's dedication and passion, with each dish crafted from the heart. The flavors are rich, the ingredients are high-quality, and the authenticity is palpable in every bite.

From the succulent kebabs, aromatic biryanis to the, each dish reminds the food in Lahore Pakistan.

The ambiance adds to the experience, offering a cozy and welcoming vibe that makes it perfect for a relaxing dining experience. Shalimar Cuisine is truly a hidden gem, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a unique and delicious Pakistani dining experience in Reykjavik.
Great little shop- good was terrific and fresh! We ordered the garlic naan and the tandoori chicken pizza (with no onion). Both were amazing!
Authentic and delicious. Great customer service and friendly staff. Would definitely visit again if in Reykjavik
The best things happen by chance. We stopped by this little gem for lunch. The food is fantastic, freshly made and delicious. Definitely a fantastic cook behind the scenes.
